s3_bucket.name: s3_bucket
s3_bucket.description: S3 Bucket name for asset upload

aws_key.name: aws_key
aws_key.description: AWS Key for S3 upload (if not using ~/.fab/global.config.json)

aws_secret.name: aws_secret
aws_secret.description: AWS Secret Key for S3 upload (if not using ~/.fab/global.config.json)

cf_api_key.name: cf_api_key
cf_api_key.description: Cloudflare Workers API key (if not using ~/.fab/global.config.json)

cf_account_id.name: cf_account_id
cf_account_id.description: Cloudflare Workers Account ID (if not using ~/.fab/global.config.json)

cf_email.name: cf_email
cf_email.description: Cloudflare Workers Account Email (if not using ~/.fab/global.config.json)
